name: Gavekal
membership: European Chamber of Commerce in China
goal: Provides analysis of economic trends to investors and companies about global economic trends, consumer behaviour and industrial developments.
euInitiatives: Dr. Lance Noble has requested a meeting with Mr. Miguel Ceballos Baron from Commissioner Cecilia Malmstrom's cabinet. Mr. Ceballos Baron has agreed to meet with me in his office at 10 am on Thursday, 15th February pending approval of Gavekal's inclusion in the transparency register. The purpose of the meeting would be to discuss recent developments in cybersecurity in China, impact on China's business environment for European firms and how international firms and governments view these developments. Dr. Noble would also share the findings of my research on this topic to date, including feedback from companies and other governments that he has already met with.
